newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: TABLE - Dutch bourse turnover up 5.6 pct in H1 1997.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Dutch bourse turnover up 5.6 pct in H1 1997.

text.p: Turnover in shares and bonds on the Amsterdam stock exchange rose 5.6 percent to a value of 1,077 billion guilders in the first half of 1997.

At the end of the period the market value of all shares listed on the exchange came to just over 1,000 billion guilders, with the largest company, Royal Dutch Petroleum Co accounting for 21 percent of total market capitalistion.
